summary: Adds a shrine of Stendarr to the Sleeping Giant Inn and A shrine to Talos in Gerdur\'s house.
descriptionHtml:
I was sick of getting bit by a wolf, contracting rockjoint, and crawling my cripple ass all the way to Whiterun for healing. I thought that Gerdur\'s ties to the Stormcloaks would justify her having a shrine to Talos in her house. Stendarr was added just in case you weren\'t allowed in Gerdur\'s house or have a problem with Talos...Elven jerks...

This mod adds: Talos shrine to Gerdur\'s house on the counter. / Stendarr shrine to The Sleeping Giant Inn on the bar counter.
author: Hyralux
